basic.description: This course covers neuropsychopharmacology, including the behavioral effects of of brain-mind altering drugs (i.e. psychotropics) and the biological action of drugs used to treat psychological disorders.
basic.subject: PSB
basic.title: Clinical Psychopharmacology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: PSY 2012 and PSB 2000, or PSB 3004C, or three semester hours in biology.
